tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi Everyone,

We consulted Dr.Aparna reddy for my 3 Yr old kid, very bad experience with the doctor, we went for consultation as our Kid had severe cough and wheezing for a week, she just checked the kid and decided that Kid has wheezing and suggested blood tests for ESR, IGE and CBP and Chest X-Ray and suggested 3 days Omnacortil forte syrup ( steroid medicine) and Levolin and Budecort Inhaler and Montair syrup.

We took the blood tests and got high IGE and ESR values and on follow up consultation she said the Kid is allergic and we have to take TB test.
She asked if kid has frequent Fevers and Vomitings, when we answered that during season changes kid gets fever she arrogantly said that it‚Äôs not how you assume you can‚Äôt decide what problem kid has and when we asked what‚Äôs the frequency of fever to understand if it‚Äôs TB case she didn‚Äôt have any answer and said I can‚Äôt give you a single line answer for this.
She finally suggested to monitor temperature regularly and continue Montair and levolin (sos) and budecort and added a multivitamin syrup.

* ****** * ** *** ***** **** ******* ******** ** ** **** **** ** ************* *** *** **** *** ***** ******* *** ******* ** **** ****** ** ***************** **** ** ******* *** ************ *** *** *** **** ******** ********* **** ** ***************

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this doctor especially for Kids, this was my baddest experience ever, ** *** ******* **** ** *** ***** *** **** ** *** ********** ** ***** ****** **** *****
Thanks,
V

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Aparna for my kid's (4 year old) coughing issue. He had coughing since 1 week, no fever or chest congestion. On our first visit she suggested us to take blood test (Rs 5400) and x-ray (Rs 1000). Surprisingly, the patient who was ahead of us and who came next to us were in same blood test and x-ray line. She asked us to buy some pump for coughing, I informed her that I have nebulizer at home but still she insisted to buy one. X-ray and blood test reports were normal. On our second visit she did not tell us the reason of the cough and ****** asked us to take TB test (Rs 3500), which also came normal. ***** ** ****** ******* ** **, ***** *** ** ***** ** ***** ********** ****** *** **** ** ** ** **** ***** *** ***** ** ** ***** ***** **** ***** This time also she insisted to buy that pump. ***** *** ** *********** *********** ** ** ***** ******** **** ***** ****** ********* ********** ** **** Later I chose not to visit her *** ******* ** **** ***** ************ ********** ** *** ***** ***** **** ** **** ** **** *** ***** ** *** ** **** ******* *** ********** **** ************** ********** ** * **** ** ***** ***** *** ******** ****** ** * ********* ******* ******** **** * ***** *** **** **** *** ************ *** ** ***** **** ** ***** ***** *** ** *** **** ****** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Aparna Reddy is a very impatient doctor I have ever seen. She doesn't listen to us completely and talks rudely. When I mentioned my kids age while she was prescribing she said " I know , have some CONFIDENCE before you enter my room otherwise don't come" . And I have travelled for an hour with my sick child just to consult her without CONFIDENCE üëè.  She doesn't want to know about the patients history or previous medications . It was a very bad experience üëé.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She was not ready to listen anything she just changed brand and gave other medicine no new treatment was done by her

*** ** ****** **** **** ******* I have been consulting since 2014, she is explaining each and everything about taking care of kids , my kid is very very active because of her medication, thank you very very much of this doctor

I had a very good experience with her.she is like a family 
Person rather than a doctor who just works for his Income.
